# GDPuc

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/johanneskoch94/GDPuc/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/johanneskoch94/GDPuc/actions)

GDPuc provides a single function to convert GDP time-series data from one unit to another. All common GDP units are supported.
